name: GOLDEN HELL
description:
The game's main objective is to collect gold and jewels and avoid swords that will appear from below and missiles that will come out from above after getting between 50 and 100 points.

The reason for naming the game by this name is because of the presence of gold and jewels, which is a paradise and a great love for many people, but there are deadly obstacles in that imaginary paradise, and that is why I named it by that name.

The gameplay is straightforward:

Right button to move right

Left button to push left

I hope you evaluate and criticize the game

thank you
